about_the_game:
Beautiful and exotic music from Ayato Sound Create that brings a dreamy, classic dimension of sound to your game audio palette. PASTEL is a fantastic brush of musical colour sure to add depth and beauty to your game soundtracks!

Features:

* 23 royalty-free songs for your games
* ogg, mp3, m4a, wav and looping ogg files included
* For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

01_SHIZUMA
02_New days
03_Fruits
04_Lunatic Metro
05_Business
06_Call
07_Documents
08_She is
09_Escape
10_Lesson
11_piano piece
12_Madam
13_Devil of funk
14_Run
15_Engineer
16_DreamDrive
17_StrongZero
18_Inner world
19_Women
20_Time limit
21_Cinderella
22_Summer vacation
23_Dream


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - PASTEL" and "RPG Maker MV - PASTEL" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Beautiful and exotic music from Ayato Sound Create that brings a dreamy, classic dimension of sound to your game audio palette. PASTEL is a fantastic brush of musical colour sure to add depth and beauty to your game soundtracks! Features: * 23 royalty-free songs for your games * ogg, mp3, m4a, wav and looping ogg files included * For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!
